text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump WHAT GARBAGE. America ranks as the worst country in the World regarding testing and treatment of the coronavirus. We now have over 156,000 deaths, so do t you dare pat yourselves on the back. #VoteTrumpOut2020 #penceforprison2021
